body:
Hello! After a year as Referee, today i decided to retire. I retired because Mnecraft doesn´t entretaining anymore, it isn´t recently: in March i was around a month inactive in Minecraft and i just play Avicus for no get demoted. It is probably i don´t play Minecraft for a while. However, i will still be active on the forums and the Slack.

I want thanks to:
{tag=2d6f79100ad94d87b5285beb41c150ce} and {tag=0c20aa0d82f946cdaeae29cf1f112aa2} for help me when i started as referee and i think they are the best referees and the more experienced referees.
 
To all the official but especially to {tag=2e0d2afbde584222a95aad8ebfce1ee3} who help me a lot. As many of you know, the next tournament was announced and i really hope all the event-staff do a great job and do the best Avicus tourney and the competitive become active again.

 Is probably he didn´t know but {tag=0e56116560bf49e6aa383db002ad7d08} help me to become active again for a weeks because i really enjoy playing with him, he is a great person and i think is doing a incredible job as builder and as moderator. Love you man <3

Good Bye!
body_tagged:
Hello! After a year as Referee, today i decided to retire. I retired because Mnecraft doesn´t entretaining anymore, it isn´t recently: in March i was around a month inactive in Minecraft and i just play Avicus for no get demoted. It is probably i don´t play Minecraft for a while. However, i will still be active on the forums and the Slack.

I want thanks to:
JDKL and  resepignev for help me when i started as referee and i think they are the best referees and the more experienced referees.
 
To all the official but especially to  Vobaseball12 who help me a lot. As many of you know, the next tournament was announced and i really hope all the event-staff do a great job and do the best Avicus tourney and the competitive become active again.

 Is probably he didn´t know but  AbusiveUser help me to become active again for a weeks because i really enjoy playing with him, he is a great person and i think is doing a incredible job as builder and as moderator. Love you man <3

Good Bye!
title: My retirement

replies.body: Thank you for your time as a Referee here on Avicus :)
replies.body_tagged: Thank you for your time as a Referee here on Avicus :)

replies.body: We're really going to miss you, Scaglia!! Thank you for your work here as a referee!!
replies.body_tagged: We're really going to miss you, Scaglia!! Thank you for your work here as a referee!!

replies.body: Que pena scaglia. Fuiste un buen amigo, te voy a extrañar :(
replies.body_tagged: Que pena scaglia. Fuiste un buen amigo, te voy a extrañar :(

replies.body:
Gracias por todo. 

Pasate de vez en cuando
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I hope you have luck in your plans and in your life.
